name: DMMd Tumblr Navigation Icons
description: A rewrite of the original code that now works with the latest tumblr update. Noiz's icon appears only when you have NEW xkit enabled.
additional_info:
UPDATE - December 20, 2015:

Mink now represents the messaging option. Enjoy!

September 27, 2015:

Fixed any positioning errors to the best of my ability. Also made it so that Clear represents the Activity Button and Mink represents the Account Button, so now they're individual! 

Noiz has been edited to represent the NEW xkit extension and will no longer work with the old xkit. If you still have the old xkit, please uninstall it and install the new one. Enjoy!

December 9, 2014:

Tumblr has added a new "discover" button between the inbox and home icons. To make up for that gap, Ren has finally been added. Enjoy!

December 8, 2014:

Tumblr recently made a change in the navigation so that the settings, help and logout buttons appear with a drop down menu, thus ruining the theme. I've fixed it to the best of my ability by making Clear and Mink both work as the drop down menu.
